title: How to Make Glitter Bangles

steps.headline: Prepare a work space surface.
steps.description: Put down newspaper or something equally protective over your working surface. Have a small vacuum cleaner ready to vacuum up loose glitter at the end.

steps.headline: Place the glitter into a saucer.
steps.description: If using various colors, add the glitter to several different saucers. Arrange these neatly on the work surface.

steps.headline: Place the hot glue around the edges of the bangles.
steps.description: Use a glue gun if wished. Alternately, use glue in a tube and carefully add the glue around it, evenly.

steps.headline: Dip the bangles in glitter.
steps.description: Roll the bangle through the glitter on the saucers. If you want the bangle to have different colors, only roll some of the way and leave some glue free to pick up a different color on another part of the bangle.

steps.headline: Shake off any excess glitter.
steps.description: Re roll making sure the bangle is covered properly. Or, use this second roll to add a different glitter color to the bangle. Shake off any excess again.

steps.headline: Set aside to dry.
steps.description: Wash the glitter off your hands and vacuum up.

steps.headline: Paint on a layer of collage podge or mod podge over the top of the bangle.
steps.description: This will seal the glitter to prevent it from wearing off your bangle.

text: Preparation Prepare a work space surface. Put down newspaper or something equally protective over your working surface. Have a small vacuum cleaner ready to vacuum up loose glitter at the end. Place the glitter into a saucer. If using various colors, add the glitter to several different saucers. Arrange these neatly on the work surface. Adding Glitter to the Bangles Place the hot glue around the edges of the bangles. Use a glue gun if wished. Alternately, use glue in a tube and carefully add the glue around it, evenly. Dip the bangles in glitter. Roll the bangle through the glitter on the saucers. If you want the bangle to have different colors, only roll some of the way and leave some glue free to pick up a different color on another part of the bangle. Shake off any excess glitter. Re roll making sure the bangle is covered properly. Or, use this second roll to add a different glitter color to the bangle. Shake off any excess again. Set aside to dry. Wash the glitter off your hands and vacuum up. Paint on a layer of collage podge or mod podge over the top of the bangle. This will seal the glitter to prevent it from wearing off your bangle. Done. Wear with your favorite clothing.
